original_text: The disciples went out everywhere. They told people God's good news. The Lord worked with them. He did powerful things to show that the message which they spoke was true.]
korean_text: 제자들이 나가 두루 전파할새 주께서 함께 역사하사 그 따르는 표적으로 말씀을 확실히 증언하시니라]

sentences.original_text: They told people God's good news
to show that the message which they spoke was true
sentences.korean_translation: 그들이 말한 메시지가 참되다는 것을 보여주기 위해
